parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account. You do not need to specify this parameter because this parameter is discontinued.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. **The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DedicatedClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster. If the **MetricType** parameter is set to **CLUSTER**, enter the ID of the exclusive cluster. Otherwise, set this parameter to a node ID.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration or synchronization task.

parameters.name: MetricType
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the metrics of the cluster or a node. Default value: CLUSTER. Valid values:

*   **CLUSTER**: query the metrics of the cluster.
*   **NODE**: query the metrics of a node.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance resides.
